review: Doctor explaination is very good friendly and carrying the patient beutiful speak positively

I had met with an accident and lost two of my teeth. Dr Vinay was a consultant doctor in the hospital where I was admitted. I must say that it was luck by chance that I met Dr Vinay there. First of all took a bold decision to redo all the facial stitches as soon as he saw my condition. 
From there on, Dr. Vinay started to guide me step by step on the entire course of treatments to be done. I started meeting him at his clinic V.K dental clinic.

Dr Vinay suggested that i had to undergo implant surgery. Dr Vinay is very knowledgeable in his field and very confident at his decisions. Dr.Vinay and Dr.Keerthana explained the entire course of treatment, care-abouts and post procedural implications very well. There wasn't anything that went out of the way. The surgery was a bit complicated considering my specific case, but Dr.Vinay did his best to ensure it to be successful. Even the cost break-up was very well defined and also Dr.Vinay tried his maximum save the cost wherever possible. Overall i had a great treatment experience at V.K Dental clinic and thanks a lot to Dr.Vinay and Dr.Keerthana for restoring my smile! ðŸ˜Š

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had my dental surgery done few week ago, both Dr. Vinay and Dr.Keerthana explained the procedure in detail and they were very patient throughout 3 hours of long tooth extraction surgery by checking if doing fine for every 5 minutes. She also took care of my post surgery infection issues with follow ups regularly.
I would definitely you recommend this place any kind of dental treatments.

review: Doctor is very friendly he will explain very clearly and he is good hearted person  he will won't make pain while treatment thank you so much Doctor ðŸ˜Š

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Recently i visited the clinic for tooth ache and both the doctors Dr Vinay and Dr Keerthana understood my condition and suggested me the wisdom teeth removal so I underwent the same and I really appreciate the aspectic precautions they implied and removed both my tooth in just 45 mins with local anaesthetic application. Really appreciate the friendly doctors for the advice and post care instructions. I would highly recommend both the doctors for any dental issues .They are best in their work ðŸ˜Š

**** *** ** *** **** ****** ****** ***** **** ******* ** ***. Dr. Vinay Singh Yadav is one of the best dental doctor whom I've met. He looks into the matter properly and comes with easy solutions to our problems. He tries to solve the problem with minimal resources and doesn't scare the patient by telling a surgery is required and has to be done right away. He makes sure that the patient is comfortable and diagnoses the problem and explains it clearly to the patient and then suggests the solution. His technique is excellent and i myself have got a wisdom tooth knocked out with ease though my teeth was not completely open. His guidance helped me recover very soon. Overall I'm happy with the clinic, doctor and the equipments. My suggestion please do visit the clinic once and you can feel safe.

I recently visited here to get a dental procedure done. Dr.Vinay and his team did  the initial diagnosis and explained about the treatment options and the pros and cons of it. They were very patient in clarifying my concerns. The doctors here are professional and caring, the entire procedure went smoothly and I'm satisfied with the treatment, thanks to Dr.Viany and his team. Overall, it was a good experience and do visit the clinic, definitely recommended.

I have visited the clinic several times even though it is far away from my residence for my dental treatment.lnitially I was examined thoroughly and  the doctor explained the procedure , treatment plan, cost and gave me certain guidelines of  oral health. The doctor is **** ********** kind and caring. I am satisfied with the treatment and thanks to Dr. Vinay Sir, Dr. Keerthana  Mam and team. It is one of the best dental clinics.

It was very great experience,  the Dr. Explained us in full detail about the procedure perfectly and charged us very reasonable,  very clean and perfectly maintained clinic with all the procedure s in below one roof with all the speclists,  I recommend all to have a check up and if needed go forward  for the next process

I had a very good and pleasant experience with Dr..Vinay. He is friendly and explains the procedures in detail. Very good follow-up after the surgery. The ambiance of his clinic is also very good equiped with latest dental technologies and his fees is also reasonable.He could be approached any time when he is free.In all I had a very good experience. 
I recommend Dr. Vinay  for all your dental problems.
